text: "Why" is a song and recorded by American country music artist Jason Aldean. It was released in November 2005 as second single from his album Jason Aldean. ==Music video== It premiered on CMT on November 17, 2005. It debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of January 12, 2006. It made history on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for being at number one for consecutive two weeks. ==References== Category:2005 songs
title: Why (Jason Aldean song)
